entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as being present in the scene, speaking with Dumbledore. He is described as stomping out of the room looking embarrassed.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as being present in the scene, speaking with Hagrid and Harry. He is described as brushing rooster feathers off his desk.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being present in the scene, speaking with Dumbledore. He is described as waiting nervously while Dumbledore considers him.

entities.name: rooster
entities.description: A rooster is mentioned as falling limply at Hagrid's side.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as shouting 'You'll be next, Mudbloods!' in Harry's thoughts.

entities.name: moaning myrtle
entities.description: Moaning Myrtle is mentioned as having a Polyjuice Potion simmering away in her bathroom in Harry's thoughts.

relationships.description: Dumbledore spoke to Hagrid, telling him that he didn't think it was Harry who attacked those people.
Dumbledore spoke to Harry, asking him if there was anything he wanted to tell him.
